intents.response: Hello! Welcome to your banking assistant. How can I help you today?
We offer the following account types: Savings Account, Current Account, Fixed Deposit (FD), and Recurring Deposit (RD).

patterns: How do I open a bank account?
intents.response: You can open an account by visiting any branch with your ID proof and address proof, or apply online through our portal.

patterns: How much money do I have?
intents.response: For security, please log in to your internet banking or mobile banking app to check your balance.
You can view your transaction history by logging into our mobile app or by visiting your nearest ATM.
We offer Home Loans, Personal Loans, Education Loans, and Vehicle Loans. Interest rates vary by loan type and credit score.
We offer a variety of credit cards including rewards cards, travel cards, and business cards. Apply online or at any branch.

patterns: How much will I earn in fixed deposit?
Is there interest for FD accounts?
Current interest rate for fixed deposit?
How much interest does FD pay?
How much will I get after maturity?
What are the returns on FD?
intents.response: Our savings account offers 4.5% annual interest. Fixed Deposits offer up to 6.75% depending on tenure and amount.
Please enable GPS or visit our website's ATM locator to find the nearest ATM.
Our branches are open Monday to Friday from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM and Saturday from 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM.
You can call our 24/7 customer support at 011-1234567 or email us at support@bank.com.
You can transfer money via NEFT, RTGS, or IMPS using your net banking or mobile app.
To block your card immediately, call our 24x7 helpline or use the mobile app under 'Manage Cards'.
You can update your KYC by submitting your documents through the mobile app or visiting any branch.
You're most welcome! Let me know if you have any more questions.
I'm not sure I understand that yet, but I'm learning every day. Could you try asking something else related to banking?
we dont't know your account number, please login to you account from banking portal
